      • updateJustification

        public void updateJustification(java.util.Set<ConstrainedAssertionFilter> justified,
                       AssertionEquivalenceClasses valid,
                       boolean useClosure)
        use the given filters to update the justification levels
        Parameters:
        justified - filter for justification
        valid - assertions that are considered valid
        useClosure - if true, use all validAssertions as justification base, otherwise only given assertions

      • relativeJustification

        calculate the relative justifiedness of given (student) assertions
        Parameters:
        expert - structure containing validness and justifiedness information that is used as comparator for relative justification levels

        Parameters:
        justificationNeeded - assertion for that the lookup is done
        otherGivenAssertions - other assertions that may be used
        Returns:

                          int currentDepth,
                          int maximumDepth)
        Parameters:
        toJustify -
        disregard - these assertions are considered to be justified already
        forbidden - these assertions are to be justified right now
        currentDepth -
        maximumDepth -
